name: Fancy Ball 2
description:
Game about stuff like:

Jumping HIGHER and HIGHER.
Controlling TIME and SPACE.
Being a BALL in that looks like a slice of PIZZA.

Those are just some things you can do in Fancy Ball 2.

We don't want to give too many spoilers in this description because we want you download the game. We don't think you are still reading this, but if you are, please download the game and see for yourself all the things that you can do.
